channel.title: Resources on Hiro Yamakawa
channel.description: Recent content in Resources on Hiro Yamakawa

item.title: Useful Tech resources
item.description: SQL SQLZoo: The one I usually advise to friends who get started with SQL Selectstarsql SQL Murder Mystery: quick murder investigation using SQL, this one is rather fun SQLbolt bipp A Curious Moon - Big Machine: Learn PostgreSQL the way the pros do: on the job and under pressure ðŸŒ” ðŸš€ Medium-hard SQL interview Questions - HN Stratascratch SQL questions Leetcode Top 70 :requires Premium Leetcode account How does Database indexing work - HN Tools The Missing Semester of Your CS Education GIT immersion Python Jetbrains Academy / Hyperskill : Paid Courses / tight integration with PyCharm IDE The little book of Python Anti Patterns : How not to write Python Code Python builtins worth learning Understanding all of Python, through its builtins Python Design Patterns - HN Python Morsels: Free Trials / Write better Python code in 30 min each Week Computer Science Teach Yourself CS Arcane Algorithm Archive Data Engineering How Data Engineering Works - Youtube Data Engineering Wiki BackEnd Backend Developer Roadmap : Check the other roadmaps and guides !

item.title: Useful Websites, Apps and Accessories
item.description: Websites - [YOPMAIL](https://yopmail.com) : A disposable mail address (to keep your main one clean from any spams - [MULLVAD](https://mullvad.net/) : Useful VPN, also available on Smartphones and tablets (5e/Month) - [MINE](https://saymine.com/): to request deletion of personal data from websites More TBA Chrome Extension - [Toby](https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/toby-for-chrome/hddnkoipeenegfoeaoibdmnaalmgkpip): Tab organizer - [Ublock origin](https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/ublock-origin/cjpalhdlnbpafiamejdnhcphjbkeiagm): to block ads(instead of Adblock) - [Block Site](https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/block-site-website-blocke/eiimnmioipafcokbfikbljfdeojpcgbh): to be more productive - [Grammarly](https://chrome.
